sentences.en: When you eat breakfast together, how does it go?
sentences.cn: 当你们一起吃早餐的时候，情况怎么样？

sentences.en: Women who play sports and frequently cycle or swim can also break their hymen, even though they might be virgins.
sentences.cn: 女性做运动和经常性地骑自行车或游泳都可以让她们的处女膜破裂，即使她们可能是处女。

sentences.en: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.cn: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.en: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.cn: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

phrases.cn: 常规性的锻炼；经常操练，按时训练

sentences.en: When do you do morning exercise?
sentences.cn: 你什麽时候做早操？

sentences.en: He found it useful to his health to do morning exercise every day.
sentences.cn: 他发现每天做早操对健康十分有益。

sentences.en: Thirdly, wed better do morning exercise every day, do sports frequently to make our bodies strong.
sentences.cn: 第三，我们最好每天做早操运动频繁，能使我们的体魄强壮。

sentences.en: We beseech thee to come eat dinner with us.
sentences.cn: 我们恳求你来和我们一起吃晚饭。

sentences.en: After a nap, television entertains the apprentices until they eat dinner and retire.
sentences.cn: 在小睡之后，新手们会一直看电视直到吃晚饭和就寝。

sentences.en: Or they can eat dinner and listen to live music at the Mangy Moose Saloon.
sentences.cn: 或者，他们可以在梅吉.穆斯沙龙吃晚餐，并聆听现场音乐会。

sentences.en: If don't clean my room,my mother won't____me meet my friends.
sentences.cn: 如果我不清理房间，我妈妈不让我见我的朋友。

sentences.en: I could clean my room and then ask if I could go to the party.
sentences.cn: 我会整理好自己的房间，然后问妈妈我是否可以去参加聚会。

sentences.en: For example: "I'm really angry at Mom because she won't let me go to the party until I clean my room.
sentences.cn: 例如：我真的很生气，因为如果我不整理好房间，妈妈就不让我去参加聚会。

sentences.en: Take it outside, go for a walk or eat at your desk.
sentences.cn: 那就打包带走，边散步边吃，或者在办公桌上吃。

sentences.en: Don't like eating in the lunch room? Take it outside, go for a walk or eat at your desk.
sentences.cn: 不喜欢在餐厅吃午餐吗？那就打包带走，边散步边吃，或者在办公桌上吃。

sentences.en: I try to do something, however little, try to make the effort to wash and dress and go for a walk every day, which helps me to feel in control of my life.
sentences.cn: 我会尽力去做一些事情，尽管很微小，我会努力每天去洗漱更衣并且出去散步，这可以帮助我感觉到我还能够控制我的生活。

sentences.en: I usually go shopping with my aunt.
sentences.cn: 我通常和我阿姨一起去购物。

sentences.en: All the schools have music and dancing as part of the curriculum.
sentences.cn: 每个学校都设有音乐课和舞蹈课。

sentences.en: Let's go dancing tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们今晚去跳舞吧。

sentences.en: On Saturdays, I often take a dancing class in the morning .
sentences.cn: 周六上午我经常上舞蹈课。

sentences.en: When are we leaving?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.en: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.cn: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.en: When will the work be finished?
sentences.cn: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.en: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.cn: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.en: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.cn: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.en: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.cn: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.en: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.cn: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.en: Have you started your homework?
sentences.cn: 你开始做家庭作业了吗？

sentences.en: I’d better get started (= start doing something ) soon.
sentences.cn: 我最好马上就开始。

phrases.cn: [美国口语] 制造麻烦；引起争吵(或打斗)

sentences.en: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.cn: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.en: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.cn: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.en: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

sentences.en: They are touring in Spain.
sentences.cn: 他们正在西班牙旅游。

sentences.en: Spain ceded the Philippines to the United States.
sentences.cn: 西班牙将菲律宾群岛割让给美国。

sentences.en: This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿在一百多年以前就割让给西班牙了。

sentences.en: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.cn: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.en: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.cn: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.en: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.cn: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.en: She adjourned the meeting until tomorrow at 9 a.m.
sentences.cn: 她把会议延至明天上午9点举行。

sentences.en: The time appointed for the mass meeting was 9 a.m.
sentences.cn: 群众大会上午9点届时召开。

sentences.en: Radio Beijing radiobroadcasts news at 9 a.m. every day.
sentences.cn: 北京广播电台每天上午九时广播新闻。

sentences.en: The spa is open from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. every day of the year.
sentences.cn: 温泉区全年从早上7:00到晚上9:00开放。

sentences.en: Why are you crying?
sentences.cn: 你为什么哭？

sentences.en: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.en: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.cn: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.en: She always does the weekly shop on a Friday.
sentences.cn: 她总是在星期五进行每周一次的采购。

sentences.en: Where do you work?
sentences.cn: 你在哪里上班？

sentences.en: Many young people in the area have never worked.
sentences.cn: 该地区的许多年轻人从未工作过。

sentences.en: The injury means he’ll probably never work again.
sentences.cn: 这伤意味着他很有可能再也不能工作了。

sentences.en: I hadn’t seen him since the last meeting.
sentences.cn: 自从上次会面后，我再没有见到他。

sentences.en: By the sound of it, things are worse than we thought.
sentences.cn: 听起来，情况比我们原来想的还要糟。

phrases.cn: n. 音响系统；音响设备

sentences.en: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.cn: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.en: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.cn: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.en: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.cn: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

phrases.cn: 不仅……而且…… 并且；表强调

sentences.en: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.cn: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.en: a busy mother of four
sentences.cn: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.en: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.cn: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.en: You don’t really need a car.
sentences.cn: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

sentences.en: Plants need light in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 植物需要光才能存活。

sentences.en: The camcorder needs a new battery.
sentences.cn: 这台摄像机需要一块新电池。

sentences.en: ‘Macbeth’ is playing at the Theatre Royal in York.
sentences.cn: 《麦克白》正在约克的皇家剧院上演。

sentences.en: She read out the letter to all of us.
sentences.cn: 她把那封信读给我们大家听。

sentences.en: Her letter hints of her love to (towards) me.
sentences.cn: 她的来信暗示了她对我的爱。

sentences.en: The letter passed from one to another until everyone had read it.
sentences.cn: 这封信从一个人转手到另一个人直到每个人都看过。

phrases.cn: 严格地，不折不扣地；严格按照字句

sentences.en: He lives just across the street from me.
sentences.cn: 他就住在我街对面。

sentences.en: We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.en: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.cn: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

phrases.cn: 不会感到内疚，会心安理得的；自重

sentences.en: The Cayman Islands
sentences.cn: 开曼群岛

sentences.en: the Greek island of Crete
sentences.cn: 希腊克里特岛

sentences.en: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.cn: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.en: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.cn: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.en: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.cn: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.en: the entrance to a cave
sentences.cn: 洞穴的入口

sentences.en: I often go swimming on weekday.
sentences.cn: 我经常在周日去游泳。

sentences.en: Where do you go swimming?
sentences.cn: 你们去哪里游泳呢？

sentences.en: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.cn: 你祖父母每天去游泳吗？

sentences.en: Who’s winning (= who is most successful at this point in the game )?
sentences.cn: 现在谁领先？

sentences.en: spring flowers
sentences.cn: 春花

phrases.cn: 春节（中国农历正月初一）

sentences.en: the long hot summer of 1976
sentences.cn: 1976 年炎热漫长的夏天

sentences.en: The children play on the beach during the summer.
sentences.cn: 夏天孩子们在海滩上玩耍。

sentences.en: a hot summer’s day
sentences.cn: 一个炎热的夏日

sentences.en: autumn mists
sentences.cn: 秋天的雾霭

sentences.en: Soon it will be winter.
sentences.cn: 很快要到冬天了。

sentences.en: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.cn: 换季对植物的影响

sentences.en: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
sentences.cn: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.en: a picnic table
sentences.cn: 野餐桌

sentences.en: There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.cn: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.en: I'd like to go on a picnic.
sentences.cn: 我想去野餐。

sentences.en: A: Would you like to go on a picnic this Sunday morning?
sentences.cn: 你愿意星期天上午去野餐吗？

sentences.en: I don't understand why you want to keep the same book every night...oh,well *sigh* "It was a warm spring day,and the six bunny-wunnies decided to go on a picnic...
sentences.cn: 真不懂你怎麽每晚都读同一本书...好吧，唉！“温暖的春天�，六只宾尼兔打算去野餐...

sentences.en: We picked some blackberries to eat on the way.
sentences.cn: 途中我们采了一些黑莓吃。

sentences.en: Amy picked a small bunch of wild flowers.
sentences.cn: 埃米采了一小把野花。

sentences.en: a dish of freshly picked peas
sentences.cn: 一盘新摘的豌豆

sentences.en: We helped the farmers to pick apples.
sentences.cn: 我们帮助农民们摘苹果。

sentences.en: People like to go to farms in the countryside and pick apples.
sentences.cn: 人们喜欢去郊区的农场摘苹果。

sentences.en: As an adult, I do my best to take my 9- and 7-year-old nieces every year on the same hay rides through the apple orchards I visited to pick apples when I was their age.
sentences.cn: 成年之后，我每年都会尽量带上自己9岁和7岁的侄子开车经过一片苹果园，在他们这个年纪的时候，我曾在这里参观过并摘过苹果。

sentences.en: The children were balling up snow to make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在把雪堆成球状，做一个雪人。

sentences.en: "He gave me a hug and a kiss and asked me where my snowman was," she said.
sentences.cn: 黛比说：“他给了我一个拥抱和亲吻。 还问我的雪人在哪里。”

sentences.en: If you are wrong,the snowman with the correct answer will chill your heart.
sentences.cn: 如果你是错误的，有正确答案的雪人将会使你的心脏变冷。

sentences.en: A：Certainly! Shall we make a snowman?
sentences.cn: 当然!我们堆雪人好吗?

sentences.en: Click ALFY to help him make a snowman.
sentences.cn: 按一下阿飞帮助他堆一个雪人。

sentences.en: I wish I can make a snowman in winter.
sentences.cn: 我希望我可以在冬天堆雪人。

sentences.en: I often go swimming on weekday.
sentences.cn: 我经常在周日去游泳。

sentences.en: Where do you go swimming?
sentences.cn: 你们去哪里游泳呢？

sentences.en: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.cn: 你祖父母每天去游泳吗？

sentences.en: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.cn: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.en: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.cn: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.en: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.cn: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

sentences.en: He won the best actor award.
sentences.cn: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.en: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.cn: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.en: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.cn: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.en: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.cn: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.en: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.cn: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.en: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.cn: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

sentences.en: How Not To get a good job.
sentences.cn: 如何不得到一个好工作。

sentences.en: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.cn: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.en: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.cn: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.en: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.cn: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.en: We’re planning a vacation in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们正计划去欧洲度假。

sentences.en: We’re planning to go on vacation soon.
sentences.cn: 我们在计划近期去度假。

sentences.en: Have you done all your homework?
sentences.cn: 你作业都做完了吗？

sentences.en: They were quarrelling all the time (=  very often or continuously  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们老是在吵架。

sentences.en: Hannah didn’t say a single word all the way back home (=  during the whole of the journey  ) .
sentences.cn: 回家时汉娜一路上没说一句话。

sentences.en: Hannah’s face went pink.
sentences.cn: 汉娜的脸上泛起了红晕。

phrases.cn: 非常健康；气色红润；精力充沛

sentences.en: She had a lovely face.
sentences.cn: 她有一张漂亮的脸蛋。

sentences.en: What a lovely house!
sentences.cn: 多么漂亮的房子啊！

sentences.en: You look lovely in that dress.
sentences.cn: 你穿那条连衣裙很漂亮。

sentences.en: a flowering bush with large shiny leaves
sentences.cn: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

phrases.cn: 有叶子的；叶茂的；长满叶子的

sentences.en: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.cn: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.en: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.cn: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.en: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.cn: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

phrases.cn: 到期；集合；排队；倒塌；与某人在一起

sentences.en: acrylic and oil paints
sentences.cn: 丙烯酸颜料和油画颜料

sentences.en: I will go to Shanghai in the coming January.
sentences.cn: 在即将到来的一月份，我将去上海。

sentences.en: The lake usually freezes over by mid January.
sentences.cn: 这条湖通常在一月中旬冰封。

sentences.en: Their first child was conceived in January and born in October.
sentences.cn: 他们的第一个孩子是在一月怀上、十月出生的。

sentences.en: These trees come into leaf in February.
sentences.cn: 这些树二月里长叶子。

sentences.en: It should have been all over with and forgotten by the first of last February.
sentences.cn: 它早该在去年二月的第一天就结束了，然后被人忘得无影无踪。

sentences.en: So let us pray together on this February morning, but let us also work together in all the days and months ahead.
sentences.cn: 因此，在今天这个二月的早晨，让我们一起祈祷，而且也让我们在今后的岁月里一起工作。

sentences.en: Fresh Salmon doesn't come in before March.
sentences.cn: 在三月份以前鲑鱼不会上市。

sentences.en: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.cn: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

sentences.en: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.cn: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

phrases.cn: 愚人节；愚人节中受愚弄者

sentences.en: He will guarantee us possession of the house by May.
sentences.cn: 他保证我们在五月可搬入这间房子。

sentences.en: The hillsides in June flame with azaleas.
sentences.cn: 六月的山坡一片杜鹃花红似火焰。

sentences.en: The English countryside looks its best in May and June.
sentences.cn: 英国乡村在五、六月间景色最美。

sentences.en: Her Latin is not very good, but it can probably be pulled up between now and next June.
sentences.cn: 她的拉丁语不太好，但从现在到明年六月她可能会有所提高。

sentences.en: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.cn: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.en: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.en: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.cn: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

sentences.en: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.cn: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.en: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.cn: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.en: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.cn: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

sentences.en: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.cn: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.en: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.cn: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.en: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

sentences.en: The club will convene in October.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部将于十月开会。

sentences.en: And again in November.
sentences.cn: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.en: Too much snow in November.
sentences.cn: 太多的大雪在十一月。

sentences.en: By November, after all, it will be more than a year since the global crisis began in the US, and Obama and his team must show tangible prospects for recovery.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，到了十一月时，自全球性金融危机在美国爆发以来，已经过去一年多了。 奥巴马和他的团队必须展现出经济复苏的切实前景。

sentences.en: In the dark of December.
sentences.cn: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.en: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.cn: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

sentences.en: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.cn: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.en: She must have cooked a good few dinners over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年她一定做过不少次晚餐。

phrases.cn: 很少；只有几个；几乎没有

sentences.en: The committee disinterred a few old studies done by the predecessors to prove their point.
sentences.cn: 该委员会再现了由前任作的一些旧研究以证明他们的观点。

sentences.en: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.cn: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.en: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.cn: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.en: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.cn: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

phrases.cn: 好东西，好事情；美好的事
第一件事；一大早；最重要的事情

sentences.en: Meet me at 8.00.
sentences.cn: 八点钟来见我。

sentences.en: I’ll meet you by the main reception desk.
sentences.cn: 我在总接待处等你。

sentences.en: We arranged to meet outside the theatre.
sentences.cn: 我们说好在剧院外面碰头。

sentences.en: A number of records fell during the sports meet.
sentences.cn: 在运动会上破了多项记录。

sentences.en: The success of the sports meet turns on the weather.
sentences.cn: 运动会能否成功要看天气如何。

sentences.en: Whether it rains or not, we’ll hold the sports meet.
sentences.cn: 不管下不下雨，我们都将举行运动会。

sentences.en: on Easter Sunday
sentences.cn: 在复活节星期日

phrases.cn: （复活节人们用作礼物或装饰品的）复活节兔子；[美俚]令人仰慕的人

sentences.en: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.cn: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.en: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.cn: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.en: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

phrases.cn: 公务旅行，出差；商务旅行
往返旅行；环程旅行；[牌]大团圆

sentences.en: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.cn: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.en: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.cn: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.en: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.cn: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.en: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.cn: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.en: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.cn: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.en: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.cn: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.en: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.cn: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.en: Religion matters very much at a national level.
sentences.cn: 宗教事务在全国都非常重要。

sentences.en: Between 1929 and 1933 America’s national income fell by more than half.
sentences.cn: 1929至1933年间，美国的国民收入下降过半。

sentences.en: There are strong indications that the Prime Minister will call national elections in May.
sentences.cn: 有明显迹象预示首相将于5月召集全国大选。

sentences.en: We shall dress the hall up for the National Day.
sentences.cn: 我们要把大厅布置一新过国庆节。

sentences.en: I give you a special blessing to have it every minute per second gives you health， happiness and good luck and I hope that this is the best that you spend the National Day!
sentences.cn: 给你我特别的祝福，愿它每分每秒都带给你健康、好运和幸福，希望这是你度过的最美好的国庆节! 愿这短短的话语给你带来国庆的快乐!

sentences.en: My friends and I went to the Fragrant Mount on National Day.
sentences.cn: 国庆节那天，我和我的朋友们一起去香山游玩。

sentences.en: Her mother is American.
sentences.cn: 她妈妈是美国人。

sentences.en: a famous American writer
sentences.cn: 一位著名的美国作家

sentences.en: That we all have Thanksgiving dinner together?
sentences.cn: 我们会一起用感恩节晚餐吗？

sentences.en: As she puts it, “We do see each other for Thanksgiving and some meals.
sentences.cn: 如她所解释的那样，“我们在感恩节和一些餐会上见面”。

sentences.en: Such treaties begin with, but soon go far beyond, the jolly exchange of pie at Thanksgiving for cake on birthdays.
sentences.cn: 这样的协议一开始，就广泛的流传开来，为了生日时的蛋糕在感恩节交换派的快乐。

sentences.en: Are you going home for Christmas?
sentences.cn: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.en: a Christmas present
sentences.cn: 圣诞礼物

sentences.en: the Christmas holidays
sentences.cn: 圣诞节假期

sentences.en: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.en: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.cn: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.en: "What should I look for"?
sentences.cn: 是要我寻找什么吗？

sentences.en: Not only this will happen but you will also look for his slightest mistakes then use them as proofs for what you have been told about him!!
sentences.cn: 不仅这个将会发生，而且你也会寻找他最轻微的错误，然后将此作为他人告诉你他是怎么样的人的证据。

sentences.en: " so we can look for those features.
sentences.cn: 这样我们就可以寻找那些特征。

sentences.cn: 巧克力条

sentences.cn: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.cn: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.en: He said they invariably bring up the Easter bunny but don't know the significance of the holiday to Christianity.
sentences.cn: 他说学生们总是一成不变地提到复活节兔子但是不知道这个节日对于基督教的重要性。

phrases.cn: （复活节人们用作礼物或装饰品的）复活节兔子；[美俚]令人仰慕的人
兔八哥；兔宝宝（美国的卡通兔子人物）

sentences.en: The documents need to be ready by next Friday.
sentences.cn: 文件必须在下星期五之前准备好。

sentences.en: I reckon the film should be over by 9.30.
sentences.cn: 我估计电影9点半应该结束了。

sentences.en: By the end of the day we had sold over 2,000 tickets.
sentences.cn: 一天下来我们卖出了2,000多张票。

sentences.en: Ella was his first girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 埃拉是他的首任女友。

sentences.en: The first and last mountain I climbed was Mount Rundle (= it was the only mountain I ever climbed ) .
sentences.cn: 伦多山是我爬过的第一座山，也是最后一座。

sentences.en: the Second World War
sentences.cn: 第二次世界大战

sentences.en: the second of August
sentences.cn: 8月2日

sentences.cn: 二年级学生

sentences.cn: 在3世纪

sentences.en: her third birthday
sentences.cn: 她的3岁生日

sentences.en: in the fourth century
sentences.cn: 在四世纪

sentences.cn: 她的四岁生日

sentences.cn: 在五世纪

sentences.en: her fifth birthday
sentences.cn: 她的五岁生日

sentences.en: He poled his twelfth home run in the sixth inning.
sentences.cn: 在第六回合他打出了他的第十二次本垒打。

sentences.en: Captain: You're the twelfth in a long line of governesses, who have come to look after my children since their mother died.
sentences.cn: 上校：自从孩子们的母亲去世以后，你是来照看他们的第十二位女家庭教师。

phrases.cn: [宗]主显节（耶诞节后第十二天）

sentences.en: This was how I stepped into my twentieth year.
sentences.cn: 我就是这样地跨进我的二十岁年纪。

sentences.en: The four and twentieth to Romamtiezer, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve.
sentences.cn: 第二十四是罗幔提以谢。 他和他儿子并弟兄共十二人。

sentences.en: When you know you will have a second, third, or twentieth release it is easy to just add scope to the product backlog. You know you will get to that feature someday.
sentences.cn: 当你得知你将有第二个、第三个甚至第二十个发布时，它也只是简单地增加产品需求列表的范围，你知道，通过这样做，假以时日就能实现这些特性。

sentences.en: The answers, my friends, will be blowing through and creating the winds of the twenty-first century.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友，这些问题的答案将主导二十一世纪的风向，并将贯穿整个世纪。

sentences.en: At the beginning of the twenty-first century, he could note that UNESCO had joined him in this conviction.
sentences.cn: 在二十一世纪之初，他注意到联合国教科文组织已经同他一道对此深信不疑。

sentences.en: Actually I have a few vacant offices on the seventh, thirteen and twenty-first floors in Mong Kok Centre Phase Ⅱ.
sentences.cn: 我正好有一些旺角中心第二期的空置中层单位，是在七楼、十三楼和二十一楼。

sentences.en: October twenty-third. Seteven is too slow.
sentences.cn: 十月二十三号。史蒂文的进度太慢了。

sentences.en: Actually I'm not bored at all, " I said, cupping my own breast for the thirtieth time.
sentences.cn: 实际上我一点也不。" 我正说著，我托了托双乳，准备拍第十三张。

sentences.en: Linda was coming up to her thirtieth birthday and she felt empty inside. She was not touched with any man in particular and without any hope other than getting promoted in her highly competitive job.
sentences.cn: 眼下琳达快三十岁生日了，可她觉得内心空虚，还没和某个特定的男人有联系，除了在激烈竞争的工作中得到提升外，她别无希望而言。

sentences.en: The Rodent Queen—on her thirtieth birthday, they had left a toy crown on her desk, the words scrawled on with permanent marker.
sentences.cn: 在她三十岁生日时，他们在她的办公桌上放了一个玩具皇冠，上面用擦不掉的记号笔歪歪扭扭写着“啮齿动物女皇”。

sentences.en: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.cn: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.en: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.cn: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.en: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.en: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.cn: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.en: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.cn: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.en: You silly old fool !
sentences.cn: 你这个大傻瓜！

phrases.cn: 愚人节；愚人节中受愚弄者
闲荡；游手好闲；干无用的事

sentences.en: She nursed her kitten all evening.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上她一直抱着她的小猫咪。

sentences.en: Don't starve the kitten.
sentences.cn: 别饿着小猫。

sentences.en: Let someone else waste their own time filtering out the kitten stories.
sentences.cn: 让别的某某人去浪费时间筛选这些小猫的故事吧。

sentences.en: Inge kept a diary (= wrote in a diary ) during the war years.
sentences.cn: 英奇在战争年代里一直写日记。

sentences.en: I still haven’t finished painting the spare room.
sentences.cn: 我还没粉刷完那间空房间。

sentences.en: Do you still have Julie’s phone number?
sentences.cn: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

sentences.en: What’s that noise?
sentences.cn: 那是什么声音？

sentences.en: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.cn: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.en: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.cn: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.en: When the organ does appear, however, it is not only impressive in size, but its bright pink color makes it stand out against the dark fur.
sentences.cn: 然而当这个器官出现时，不仅是在尺寸上能让人留下深刻印象，它那淡粉色的颜色更是和黑色的毛皮形成鲜明对比。

sentences.en: He threw the door open and ran down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他猛地打开门，往楼下跑去。

sentences.en: an open window
sentences.cn: 打开的窗户

sentences.en: The gates swung silently open.
sentences.cn: 大门悄悄地打开了。

phrases.cn: 打开；开发；开始；展示，揭露

sentences.en: ‘How did you get here?’ ‘We walked.’
sentences.cn: “你们是怎么来这里的？”“我们是步行来的。”

sentences.en: Doctors said he’d never walk again.
sentences.cn: 医生说他再也不能行走了。

sentences.en: He loved walking in the hills.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在山里散步。

phrases.cn: 走出；罢工；退席；把（某人）领出

sentences.en: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.cn: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.en: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.cn: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.en: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.cn: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.en: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.
sentences.cn: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。

sentences.en: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.
sentences.cn: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。

sentences.en: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.
sentences.cn: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。

sentences.en: Leo took off his coat and sat down.
sentences.cn: 利奥脱掉大衣坐了下来。

sentences.en: I love his sense of humour, don’t you?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他的幽默感，你呢？

sentences.en: Even his own mother would not have recognized him.
sentences.cn: 即使他的亲生母亲也会认不出他的。

sentences.en: He bent and touched his mouth to hers.
sentences.cn: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.en: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.cn: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.en: The idea was hers.
sentences.cn: 这个主意是她出的。

sentences.en: When our washing machine broke, our neighbours let us use theirs.
sentences.cn: 我们的洗衣机坏了的时候，邻居就让我们用他们的。

sentences.en: Our house is number 25, and theirs is just opposite.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子是25号，他们的就在对面。

sentences.en: We compared scores and found that theirs were higher than ours.
sentences.cn: 我们比较了一下，发现他们的得分比我们的高。

sentences.en: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.cn: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.en: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.cn: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.en: No, that’s not ours.
sentences.cn: 不，那不是我们的。

sentences.en: a climbing rope
sentences.cn: 登山绳

sentences.en: He goes climbing nearly every weekend.
sentences.cn: 他几乎每个周末都去登山。

phrases.cn: 藤蔓植物；攀缘植物；攀绿植物

sentences.en: She rinsed her hands quickly before eating.
sentences.cn: 她吃东西以前很快洗了一下手。

sentences.en: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.cn: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.en: Those people are concerned only with eating,sleeping and procreating.
sentences.cn: 那些人关心的只不过是吃饭、睡觉和生孩子。

sentences.en: ...invite the children over to play.
sentences.cn: …邀请孩子们过来玩。

sentences.en: They played in the little garden.
sentences.cn: 他们在小花园里玩耍。

sentences.en: I jumped over the fence.
sentences.cn: 我从篱笆上跳了过去。

sentences.en: I'd jumped seventeen feet six in the long jump, which was a school record.
sentences.cn: 我跳远曾跳了17.6英尺，这是个校纪录。

sentences.en: after a night of heavy drinking
sentences.cn: 狂饮一夜之后

sentences.en: On the top floor we have sleeping quarters for women and children.
sentences.cn: 在顶楼我们有供妇女和孩子睡觉的地方。

sentences.en: She had a bottle in each hand.
sentences.cn: 她两只手上各拿着一个瓶子。

sentences.en: Grill the fish for five minutes on each side.
sentences.cn: 把鱼的两面各烤上五分钟。

sentences.en: Each member of the team is given a particular job to do.
sentences.cn: 队里的每个成员都有特定的工作要做。

sentences.en: She excelled all other authors of her day.
sentences.cn: 她超过同时代的所有其他作家。

sentences.en: He mixes well with other children in the school.
sentences.cn: 他在学校里与其他孩子能很好相处。

sentences.en: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.cn: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.en: Susan and Robert kissed each other passionately.
sentences.cn: 苏珊和罗伯特深情地亲吻。

sentences.en: The girls looked at each other.
sentences.cn: 女孩们互相看了看。

sentences.en: They enjoy each other’s company.
sentences.cn: 他俩很喜欢待在一起。

sentences.en: Steve flies home tomorrow – we’re all really excited.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫明天坐飞机回家——我们都非常激动。

sentences.en: The food was nothing to get excited about (= not very good or special ).
sentences.cn: 食物很一般，没什么特别。

sentences.en: excited crowds of shoppers
sentences.cn: 兴奋的购物人群

sentences.en: You have to fold the corners back, like so.
sentences.cn: 你得把角折回去，像这样。

sentences.en: Every morning, we see many old people doing morning exercises.
sentences.cn: 每天早上我们看见许多老人在做早操。

sentences.en: If you keep doing morning exercises every day, you will be healthy by and by.
sentences.cn: 如果你每天坚持做早操，你的身体不久以后就会健康起来。

sentences.en: You practice it while eating lunch.
sentences.cn: 你一边吃午餐一边练习；

sentences.en: I went into the dining room of the Governors Mansion, where my friends were eating lunch, told them I wasn’t running, and apologized for bringing them all down.
sentences.cn: 我走进州长官邸的饭厅，朋友们正在吃午餐，我告诉他们说不打算竞选总统了，对邀请他们大老远地跑过来感到抱歉。

sentences.en: 'I've cleared customs sitting in the dining car eating lunch, ' Mr. Thompson says.
sentences.cn: 汤普森说：我是坐在餐车吃午饭的时候办理通关手续的。

sentences.en: I remember reading a book somewhere – it said that almost all of us are waiting for something.
sentences.cn: 我记得在哪里读过一本书--- 书上说我们大部分人都一直在等待着什么。

sentences.en: They want their online experience to be simple and straightforward, like reading a book or newspaper!
sentences.cn: 他们更希望在线体验能够尽量简单和直观，就像阅读一本书或一份报纸一样！

sentences.en: If you are reading a book and no longer feel that you get enough value from it, then stop reading it.
sentences.cn: 如果你正在读一本书，但是再也感觉不到你能从中获得足够的价值，请停止阅读。

sentences.en: We spent the winter and some of the spring in my room—never hers—missing tests, listening to music, looking out my window to comment on people who wouldn't have given us a second thought.
sentences.cn: 我们整个冬天和春天的一段时间都是在我宿舍度过的——我们从不去她的房间——逃考，听音乐，在我房间探出头去，对那些压根不会注意到我们的人品头论足。

sentences.en: The idea of a “Mozart effect” remains popular, but the original study has been somewhat discredited, and any intellectual boost that comes from listening to music seems to be tiny and temporary.
sentences.cn: 所谓“莫扎特效应”的观念仍然很流行，但是原始的研究被发现有些不太可信，而且任何聆听音乐造成的智力提升似乎都是微小和临时性的。

sentences.en: You have to work hard to keep ahead in your class.
sentences.cn: 要想在全班保持成绩领先，你就必需努力学习。

sentences.en: If he continues to keep ahead, he will win the race.
sentences.cn: 如果他继续保持领先地位，他将赢得这场比赛。

phrases.cn: 隐瞒，隐藏；抑制；继续燃烧
保持；继续；不低落；不落后

sentences.en: All vehicles should keep to the right.
sentences.cn: 车辆一律靠右走。

sentences.en: Article 35 Motor vehicles and non-motor vehicles shall keep to the right of the road.
sentences.cn: 第三十五条机动车、非机动车实行右侧通行。

sentences.en: It is your responsibility to keep your desk clean.
sentences.cn: 保持课桌清洁是你的责任。

sentences.en: We just have to talk quietly.
sentences.cn: 我们只能悄悄的讲话。

sentences.en: Read stories, rub their backs, listen to music, talk quietly about the day.
sentences.cn: 讲故事、抚摸孩子的背、听音乐、轻声谈论当天的事情。

phrases.cn: 关掉，关闭；拐弯，使转变方向

sentences.en: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.cn: 那里什么都是竹子做的。

sentences.en: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.cn: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.en: Salzburg is famous for its beautiful buildings.
sentences.cn: 萨尔茨堡以美丽的建筑闻名。

sentences.en: The hotel has its own pool.
sentences.cn: 酒店有自己的游泳池。

phrases.cn: 可以说是，似乎就是；好像

sentences.en: It was very good of you to come. Let me show you to my study.
sentences.cn: 你能来真是太好了。让我带你看我的书房。

sentences.en: Milton was shown into the office.
sentences.cn: 米尔顿被领进了办公室。

sentences.en: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.cn: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.en: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.cn: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.en: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.cn: 做什么都比待在家里好！

phrases.cn: 或者其他别的事，或其他什么的
无论如何（用于否定句中）

sentences.en: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.cn: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.en: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.cn: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.en: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.cn: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.en: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.cn: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.en: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.cn: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.en: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.cn: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

sentences.en: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.cn: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.en: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.cn: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.en: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.cn: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.en: She was greatly tempted to have a look at it.
sentences.cn: 她非常想看一看。

sentences.en: Today we’ll have a look at a hadron collider of the Nuclear Physics Institute in Novosibirsk.
sentences.cn: 今天让我们来看一看位于新西伯利亚市核物理研究所的强子对撞机。

sentences.en: The children really believed that there was a rabbit on the moon. They wanted to go to the moon and have a look one day.
sentences.cn: 这个时候；一些老人会讲述许多古老的故事，如月亮上的玉兔，孩子们信以为真，他们真想有一天登上月球看个究竟。

sentences.en: No, I do not like sushi.
sentences.cn: 不，我不喜欢寿司。

sentences.en: Do you like sushi?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢寿司吗？

sentences.en: I want sushi.
sentences.cn: 我想要寿司。

sentences.en: She volunteered to teach in the school.
sentences.cn: 她自愿在学校教书。

sentences.en: If someone puts you down,you should teach him a lesson.
sentences.cn: 如果有人奚落你，你就应该教训教训他。

sentences.en: ‘Can you pick me up later?’ ‘Sure thing.’
sentences.cn: “你过一会儿能来接我吗？”“没问题。”

sentences.en: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.cn: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.en: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.cn: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.en: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

sentences.en: First-year students may elect  French, Spanish, or German.
sentences.cn: 一年级学生可选修法语、西班牙语或德语。

sentences.en: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.cn: 英国人和西班牙人是首先向北美洲开拓殖民地的。

sentences.en: At his lordship's death in the Spanish campaign in the year 1811,his estate fell in to the family of the Tiptoffs.
sentences.cn: 这位爵爷在1811年西班牙战役中死亡后，他的产业归蒂普托夫家族支配。
